reference_context: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline.
Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements.
Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs.
Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows.
Implemented data export/import functionality for data lifecycle management.
Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support.
Engineered GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines and integrated them with backend scripts.
Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module by customizing UI Forms and PL/SQL scripts.
Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation.
Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments.
Engineered a distributed system for converting video files to MP3 format using microservices architecture.
Implemented Apache Kafka producers/consumers using Confluent Cloud.
Developed a full-stack task manager webapp with CRUD operations using React and Go with PostgreSQL database.
Engineered an AI-powered voice interviewer leveraging Groq for fast inference.
Designed a 3-tier hybrid cloud architecture leveraging AWS and OpenStack.
